ISSUE of the DAY!

1.  Thromboembolic complications of #COVID19 are well known.
2.  AstraZeneca vaccine use halted due to concern over deaths due to "blood clots"
3.  22 "events" in 3MM receiving the AZ vaccine.

A concern or statistical anomaly? #vaccine #medicine #digitalhealth https://t.co/5hYMkU0iwB
